SELECT COUNT(IN_NO) FROM INSPECTION_SCHEDULE WHERE 1=1 AND IN_STATE = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(IN_NO) FROM INSPECTION_SCHEDULE WHERE 1=1 AND PT_NO = #{ptNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE INSPECTION_SCHEDULE SET PT_NO = #{ptNo}, IN_TITLE = #{inTitle}, IN_CONTENT = #{inContent}, REPORT_DATE = sysdate, IN_STATE = 'Y' WHERE IN_NO = #{inNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT INS.IN_NO, INS.PT_NO, INS.IN_STARTDATE, INS.IN_ENDDATE, INS.IN_GOAL, INS.IN_STAFF, INS.IN_PLACE, INS.IN_STATE, INS.IN_FILECODE, INS.IN_TITLE, INS.IN_CONTENT, INS.REPORT_DATE FROM INSPECTION_SCHEDULE INS LEFT OUTER JOIN PARTNER PT ON(INS.PT_NO = PT.PT_NO) WHERE 1=1 AND INS.IN_NO = #{inNo}) N LEFT OUTER JOIN FILE_DATA FD ON FD.FILE_OWNER = #{fileOwner}
SELECT IN_NO, PT_NO, IN_RECEPTION FROM INSPECTION_SCHEDULE WHERE IN_STATE = 'H' ORDER BY IN_NO ASC
mapper.delete: UPDATE INSPECTION_SCHEDULE SET IN_STATE='H' WHERE IN_NO = #{inNo}
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN IN_STATE = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS countY, SUM(CASE WHEN IN_STATE = 'N' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS countN, SUM(CASE WHEN IN_STATE = 'H' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS countH FROM INSPECTION_SCHEDULE
